snippet: An arrest warrant was issued on Thursday for the wife of a prominent Syrian television commentator and analyst who was shot dead on Wednesday in southern Lebanon.
lead_paragraph: An arrest warrant was issued on Thursday for the wife of a prominent Syrian television commentator and analyst who was shot dead on Wednesday in southern Lebanon.

headline.main: No Political Motive Behind Killing of Assad Supporter, Lebanese Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Lebanon: No Political Motive Behind Killing of Assad Supporter, Officials Say
